response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. We understand its value to you stands at $1,000,000, and we aim to make this transaction beneficial for both parties. After careful consideration, I propose to sell the product to you for $1,200,000. This price reflects the product's worth while allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
